message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, $200 is my bottom line to make this worthwhile. I understand that might be too high for you, so feel free to consider it.
